title: ‘Tadej is From Another Planet:’ Evenepoel in Awe of Tour de France Rival in Pantani-Smashing Record Climb
content:
'I would be disappointed with 4th:' Remco Evenepoel pivots to fight for Tour de France podium after proving his worth in Pyrénées.

Read the full article at ‘Tadej is From Another Planet:’ Evenepoel in Awe of Tour de France Rival in Pantani-Smashing Record Climb on Velo.
author: ahood
